featured.text: A package sent can be received in a couple of hours.

other.text: During the second Industrial Age, people toiled at unusual hours in mines or factories and often had to get up for work early in the morning.

If one travels across three time zones, he needs about __________ hours to get over his jet lag problem.
over three hours to reach the Greek island of Lesbos.

John has been working at the computer for twenty-four hours.

definition.zh_def: 小時，時間的單位，等於60分鐘。
definition.en_def: A unit of time equal to 60 minutes.
definition.example: There are 24 hours in a day.
